item.title: VisualSimpleQA: A Benchmark for Decoupled Evaluation of Large Vision-Language Models in Fact-Seeking Question Answering
item.description: VisualSimpleQA: A new benchmark for fine-grained evaluation of visual and linguistic modules in fact-seeking LVLMs.
